original_text: So he called every one of his lord's debtors unto him, and said unto the first, How much owest thou unto my lord?
korean_text: 주인에게 빚진 자를 일일이 불러다가 먼저 온 자에게 이르되 네가 내 주인에게 얼마나 빚졌느냐

sentences.original_text: So he called every one of his lord's debtors unto him,
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그는 주인의 모든 채무자들을 자신에게 불렀고,

sentences.original_text: How much owest thou unto my lord?
